reagents.name: Black Pearl
reagents.description: Used in offensive spells, especially those involving missiles or energy projectiles.

reagents.name: Blood Moss
reagents.description: Associated with movement, teleportation, and travel magic.

reagents.name: Garlic
reagents.description: Commonly used in protection spells and spells targeting undead.

reagents.name: Ginseng

reagents.name: Spider Silk
